channel.title: Adding a skill arena like allstar
channel.description:
I know how to add object but how can I make it so if u click on it u will get xp?..like allstar''s someone know a tutorial or explain it here ..
please!!

item.title: Adding a skill arena like allstar
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

Goth Wolf:

Blitz that was a pretty unhelpful response -.-

Unhelpful? All he has to do is:

if (objectID == ) {
    method call;
}
mod_lol1:

I just want the same as allstar …does anyone know the codes to add xp like the same as allstar?

Your question has been answered.

[quote=“Goth Wolf, post:7, topic:254357”]do this

if(objectID == ####) { addSkillXP(amount, id); sendMessage("You gain some experience in _____"); }

May have to change the xp giving code to the right thing but thats how it’s done

**Replace #### With oject id and amount with xp amount id with skill id and ____ with the name of the skill your training[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Adding a skill arena like allstar
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Here are object id’s that give exp:

Farming herb patch -
Herblore chest -
FireMaking chest -
General stall - 4876
Magic stall - 4877
Scimmy stall - 4878
Silk Stall - 2560
Gem Stall - 2562
Silver Stall - 2565
Crafting drawers - 3816
Obsticle pipe - 2287

Since it’s all-star source it shoudl already give exp, these are exact id’s from his skills area.

These are some others you may need:

Evergreen - 1315
Maple Tree - 1307
Magic Tree - 1306
Mining Rocks - 2111
Deposit box - 9398

Alright, there you go, enjoy.

Read full topic
